06:00.0 Ethernet controller [0200]: Qualcomm Atheros AR2413/AR2414 Wireless Network Adapter [AR5005G(S) 802.11bg] [168c:001a] (rev 01)
        Subsystem: Accton Technology Corporation SMC Wireless CardBus Adapter 802.11g (SMCWCB-G EU) [1113:ee20]
        Flags: bus master, medium devsel, latency 168, IRQ 19
        Memory at f1d00000 (32-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=64K]
        Capabilities: [44] Power Management version 2
        Kernel driver in use: ath5k
==ath5k chip info dump== 
ath5k: phy17: Atheros AR2413 chip found (MAC: 0x78, PHY: 0x45)
